definition: the world in chaos/troubled times/(in Buddhism) the mortal world
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: But, history prove less pardons in brilliant times, more pardons in troubled times.
sentences.chinese: 盛世時赦少，亂世赦多也是歷史所證明的。

sentences.english: Chaotic Nodes are clusters of chaotic events.
sentences.chinese: “亂世高潮點”是一系列的混亂事件。

sentences.english: Should you stick with stock funds in this tumultuous environment?
sentences.chinese: 在如此亂世，還該持有股票型基金嗎？

sentences.english: This has made her to start the road of pursuing her self-value in the time of misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 讓她在亂世中走上了尋求自我價值的道路。

sentences.english: Zhang Ailing is that one was born in the strange woman in troubled times.
sentences.chinese: 張愛玲就是一個生於亂世的奇女子。

sentences.english: Pan troubled times longer than the book.
Yet both are perceived as havens of safety in a troubled world.
sentences.chinese: 不過，兩者都被視爲當前亂世中的安全港。

sentences.english: I’m in a business where there’s complete anarchy.
sentences.chinese: 我的這個行業如今是徹底的亂世。

sentences.english: The Chaotic Nodes are upon you in ever-increasing intensity.
sentences.chinese: 亂世高潮點以不斷增長的強度在接近你們。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
